title: ‘Feels like a losing battle’: the fight against flooding in Somerset
description: Emergency pumps are deployed in attempt to stop water inundating homes around River Parrett
content:
Since medieval monks started draining and managing the Somerset Levels, humans have struggled to live and work alongside water.

title: Assisted dying backers accused of bullying over threat to bypass Lords
description: Opponents of bill insist government should not give it special treatment as peers delay its passage
content:
Opponents of the assisted dying bill have accused its supporters of bullying after key backers said they would attempt to bypass the House of Lords if peers continue to block it.
The Labour MP Kim Leadbeater and the Labour peer Charles Falconer said ... [3244 chars]

title: Heavy underdog Djokovic pledges to ‘fight until the last shot’ in Sinner semi-final
description: The 38-year-old has rarely been such a heavy underdog at the Australian Open but Novak Djokovic insists he is not about to wave the white flag
content: Novak Djokovic has insisted that he will not “walk out with a white flag” as he prepares for his latest battle with one of the ATP’s dominant top two in a grand slam semi-final, this time against the two-time defending champion Jannik Sinner on Frida... [3234 chars]

title: Dorset school transport cancelled as heavy rain forecast
description: Dorset Council said it, with roads flooded, it had to consider the safety school journeys
content:
All school transport in Dorset has been cancelled on Friday because of forecast heavy rain.
Dorset Council said with road closures already in place because of flooding, it had to consider the safety of bus journeys to and from school. Individual scho... [330 chars]

title: Venice invaded by cannibalistic jellyfish
description: Marine animal has created ‘serious issues’ for fishing sector, according to scientists
content:
A strange marine creature called the warty comb jelly has invaded Venice’s network of lagoons and is wreaking havoc on fish and other native species.
The gelatinous creature, also known as the sea walnut, normally lives in the western Atlantic.
